document_title: Color blindness: causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: benh-mu-mau.json_3_Who is susceptible to color blindness?
subsection_content: Men are more susceptible to color blindness than women. Because defective chromosomes in women can be passed on to sons, putting them at higher risk of disease. [9]
subsection_title: benh mu mau.json. Who is susceptible to color blindness?
subsection_data:
benh mu mau.json. Who is susceptible to color blindness?
Men are more susceptible to color blindness than women. Because defective chromosomes in women can be passed on to sons, putting them at higher risk of disease. [9]
